title: Flamingals Butt Lifting Low Rise Flamingo Jeans for Women Trendy Stretch Wide Leg Pants Denim
description: Feature: casual, low rise, high stretch, button, zipper, pocket, long jeans. Amp up your denim collection with these jeans. Featuring stretchy denim with a high-waist design, and a skinny fit. Team these with a crop top and mules for a look we're loving

Material: Made of carefully selected super elastic denim fabric so that our customers will feel free in all positions when sitting or squatting. Soft lightweight and breathable fabrics can reduce the sense of restraint
Occasion: It is versatile to wear and suits most occasions such as casual, school, office, shopping, going out, party, vacation, and so on. It is perfect for juniors, loved ones, and yourself

Size Chart: Small: Bust: 33-35", Waist: 27-28", Hips: 37-38", / Medium: Bust: 35-37", Waist: 29-30", Hips: 39-40", / Large: Bust: 37-39", Waist: 31-33", Hips: 41-43", / X-Large: Bust: 39-41", Waist: 34-36", Hips: 44-46", / XX-Large Plus: Bust: 41-43", Waist: 37-39", Hips: 47-49", / 3X-Large Plus: Bust: 43-45", Waist: 40-42", Hips: 50-52", / 4X-Large Plus: Bust: 45-47", Waist: 43-45", Hips: 53-55"

Friendly reminder, the size of this jean is small, if you want a looser effect, please order a larger size. Please refer to size measurement in the last item picture before ordering. As jeans fit experts, our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit. Since the fabric is super stretchy, we recommend you follow the exact size that fits you in the table
